name: Create Your Own Super Saiyan - DBZ Games Battle of Gods: Dragon Ball Z GT Edition
name_original: Create Your Own Super Saiyan - DBZ Games Battle of Gods: Dragon Ball Z GT Edition
description:
Love Super Saiyan? Then This App is For You! Create and Design your own Comic Book Hero!

Feeling Excited After Watching the Latest Dragonball? Can't stop thinking about Goku or Vegeta? Get this App Now!

Choose from a huge selection of costumes, masks, and more and make your very own character!

-Hundreds of Super Saiyan Combinations!
-Hours of Fun!
-Really Easy to Use!
-Fun for Kids and Adults!

Share your Super Saiyan Creations with Family and Friends through Facebook, Instagram or Email.

Start Create Your Own Super Saiyan Today, Download Now!
